other_tests.findings: Severe atlantoaxial instability; anterior and posterior atlantoaxial interval in flexion was 7 mm and 10 mm, respectively.
Broad foramen of the vertebral artery at C-2, extending deep into both pedicles.
Evidence of solid fusion without implant failure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Showed progression from initial surgical fixation to solid fusion by 36 weeks.
